message.content:
cs.DM, cs.GT, cs.LO, cs.SC, cs.AL

Reasoning: The paper deals with algebraic structures and their properties, particularly absorption, which is a concept related to constraint satisfaction problems. This suggests that the paper may belong to the Discrete Mathematics (cs.DM) sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses semigroups and n-ary semigroups, which are topics in Group Theory (cs.GT). The paper also involves necessary and sufficient conditions, which are often studied in Logic (cs.LO). Furthermore, the paper may be relevant to the sub-category of Symbolic Computation (cs.SC) due to its algebraic nature. Finally, the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of Algorithms (cs.AL) as it discusses properties of algebraic structures that may have algorithmic implications.
